meta.description: Determine the minimum cost of feeding sheep with grains to meet nutrient requirements.

sets.name: GRAINS
sets.description: Types of grains available for feeding

sets.name: NUTRIENTS
sets.description: Types of nutrients required by the sheep

params.name: nutrient_content
params.description: Nutrient content per pound of each grain

params.name: grain_cost
params.description: Cost in cents per pound of each grain

vars.name: pounds
vars.description: Pounds of each grain to feed the sheep

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(grain_cost[g] * pounds[g] for g in GRAINS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of grains in cents

constraints.name: nutrient_A_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(nutrient_content[g]['A'] * pounds[g] for g in GRAINS)
constraints.description: Ensure minimum requirement of nutrient A is met

constraints.name: nutrient_B_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(nutrient_content[g]['B'] * pounds[g] for g in GRAINS)
constraints.description: Ensure minimum requirement of nutrient B is met

constraints.name: nutrient_C_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(nutrient_content[g]['C'] * pounds[g] for g in GRAINS)
constraints.description: Ensure minimum requirement of nutrient C is met

constraints.name: nutrient_D_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(nutrient_content[g]['D'] * pounds[g] for g in GRAINS)
constraints.description: Ensure minimum requirement of nutrient D is met
